name: Ashish Kumar Thakur

experience.title: Associate Product Manager
experience.description: ● Built Self Learn module- a one stop solution for learning for students of grade 6-10 which led to boost in engagement by 40%● Revamped Onboarding, pre-test and post taking experience of assessment module to improve the retention by 30%● Secured 10 Lakhs funding to launch a fully-fledged AI/Chatgpt-powered product for enhancing student learning● Built a B2B2C web product and onboarded 100+ schools and 3000+ students within a week after the release
